title: Todo Node Progress Visualization
competitiveRationale: Miro and Notion show rich progress indicators for task lists — percentage labels, segmented bars, completion badges. Our TodoNode has a minimal 4px green bar with a text counter. Enhancing the visual feedback makes task completion more rewarding and scannable.
objective: Enhance the TodoNode progress visualization with 3 additions: (1) Add a percentage label inside the progress bar that appears when progress > 25% (e.g., '60%' in white text, centered in the filled portion). (2) Increase the progress bar height from 4px to 8px to accommodate the label. (3) Add a subtle green checkmark badge that appears when all items are completed (100%) — a small circle with a check icon overlaid on the progress bar area.

existingState.progressBar: Lines 204-217: 4px height green bar with width percentage transition
existingState.counter: Lines 194-200: Text showing 'X/Y' count in header
existingState.scrollContainer: Lines 220-226: maxHeight 200px overflowY auto — DO NOT MODIFY
existingState.itemCheckboxes: Lines 239-250: Checkbox toggle per item — DO NOT MODIFY
existingState.addItemForm: Lines 309-340: Form to add new items — DO NOT MODIFY

pattern.description: Enhance the existing progress bar with percentage label and completion badge
pattern.example: {progress > 25 && {Math.round(progress)}%}
pattern.notes: The percentage label must be very small (7px font) to fit inside an 8px bar. Use white text (#fff) with fontWeight 700 for readability on the green background. The completion badge (100%) should import Check from lucide-react and show a small green circle (16px diameter) with a white check icon (10px), positioned to the right of the progress bar. Only show the badge when progress === 100. Do NOT modify the scroll container, item list, checkboxes, edit inputs, or add-item form.

acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar height increased from 4px to 8px
Percentage label (e.g., '60%') appears inside bar when progress > 25%
Percentage label is white, 7px font, bold, centered in filled portion
Completion badge (green circle + white check) appears at 100%
Progress bar transition animation preserved (0.3s ease-out)
Counter text (X/Y) in header still displays correctly
Scrollable item list still scrolls (maxHeight 200px, overflowY auto)
Checkbox toggle, item edit, item remove, add item all still work
